data.actual_result: You connect to something you shouldn't.
data.expected_result: You don't see it, nor should you be able to connect to it.
data.short_description: You are allowed to connect to voice channels you cannot see but are not denied connection perms.
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a server where you are not allowed to see a voice channel, but are not blocked from connecting to it. - Go to quickswitcher. - Type '!' to filter by voice channels. - Find the voice channel from step 1. - Tap it to connect to it.
